title: "Artificial intelligence enables noninvasive, accurate screening for Down syndrome in the first trimester"
excerpt: "Down syndrome, also known as Trisomy 21, is the most common chromosomal abnormality causing developmental delay and intellectual disability, and it can be identified in utero. Many pregnant women seek to determine whether their fetus has this abnormality."
